definitions.text: a prominent attribute or aspect of something
examples: the map showed roads and other features
generosity is one of his best characteristics

definitions.text: the characteristic parts of a person's face: eyes and nose and mouth and chin
examples: an expression of pleasure crossed his features

definitions.text: the principal (full-length) film in a program at a movie theater
a special or prominent article in a newspaper or magazine
examples: they ran a feature on retirement planning

definitions.text: (linguistics) a distinctive characteristic of a linguistic unit that serves to distinguish it from other units of the same kind
an article of merchandise that is displayed or advertised more than other articles

examples: This restaurant features the most famous chefs in France

definitions.text: wear or display in an ostentatious or proud manner
examples: she was sporting a new hat
